ComicInfo.Summary: Crown Heights Epilogue: Danielle runs to Sara in a panic as she has accidentally gotten Finch's abusive boyfriend shot and killed. In order to protect the secret of the Witchblade, Sara fabricates a crime scene which sets up the dead beau as the Crown Heights killer. Furious at the compromises she has had to make to cover Dani's mistakes, Sara chews her out and tells her fellow Witchblade bearer that she never wants to see her again. Danielle runs to the Curator for comfort.
